title: Notable & Quotable: Laurence Tribe on Senate Precedent and Confirming Judges
sub_head: ‘No vice president in our history has ever cast a tiebreaking vote to confirm an appointment to the Supreme Court.’
body: From “No hiding behind Pence’s skirt on the Supreme Court nomination,” a Sept. 23, 2020, Boston Globe op-ed by Harvard law professor Laurence Tribe:
